title: Skechers Women's Quartz Metal and Silicone Sports Digital Watch
features: Skechers is a global athletic lifestyle brand for all. Skechers watches are designed with fashion and versatility in mind, ranging from products for your everyday on-the-go pace of life to true performance geared products when you want to break a sweat.

The Skechers Faysmith watch features a rose gold-tone case and blush silicone strap with a positive digital display including alarm, chime, 1/100 chronograph stopwatch with lap/split control, dual time and calendar format functions.
Case size: 36mm; Band size: 18mm; digital movement with positive digital display and chronograph function; imported
East/West Barrel alloy metal case; blush pink silicone band
Water resistant to 30m (100ft): withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or showering; 3ATM
description: Skechers is a global athletic lifestyle brand appealing to customers of all ages. Skechers watches are designed with fashion and versatility in mind. Ranging from products for your everyday on-the-go pace of life to true performance-geared products for when you want to break a sweat. Skechers offers the latest trends and comfort innovations through its larger-than-ever athletic lifestyle accessory offering.
